channel.title: Home on Datum, I'm Adam
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Datum, I'm Adam

item.title: Hi There
item.description: My name’s Adam Garcia. My training and work have primarily been in public health research, with a focus on biostatistics and epidemiology, but I also dabble in data science and web development. I’m currently looking for work—ideally applying my skillset and background at an organization similarly invested in those passions. I’m passionate about public health equity and social justice, and I’m eager to find ways we can thoughtfully collect data and leverage their insights to achieve a more healthy, just, and equal society.
